piyanan wahansege kamaththata purnawa awanatha wemin dewa thejasa – mahimaya hiskara minisath bawa gena gawa lenaka upatha laba, gawa oruwaka sathapawa sitina jesu bilindanan desa neth yoma sitina bhagyawantha mathawan desa netha sitha yomu karamu.

wahama ape nangith ekka thiyena law eka nawaththanawa naththam passe karadara weyi" ithin malli kiyapi "ane ayiye dan ehema ekak na" kiyala.

eeth ohuge jiwithaya ha bandichcha daiwaya ohuta kochchara akarunikada kiyanawa nam ohuta awasan gaurawa dakwanna wenne thamagema aadaraniya pemwathiyata.ee welawe ohuge sithata athuluwana hangim samudaya thamayi me widiyata me widiyata githawath wenne...

thelijja wala sita sudda […]hanthana sisuwiyan dushana siddhiye sakakaruwan 22 thek rimand…

kohoma unath ratata danwath sathya awabodha wiya yuthuyi wanse kabalgala kawadawath wadak nowana bawath.
oon diyunu wena ratawal.
ee wahal bhawayen ee janathawa midenna oona.
apa ratehi amathakawa giya purushayin saha sthrin thawaduratath amathaka karanu labuwan nowanu atha.
aluthin nikuth kerena widyuth handunum pathata angili salakunada ek kerenawa.
eka hadanna patan gaththa.
ekthara suwisheshi aagamika karanayak sambandhayen kerena nirmanayakata meya adala nowe.
epamanak no wa sesu jiwin ge pawathmata gatha nohaki lesa jalaya dushanaya wiya haki ya.
alu walin gahagannawa.
sarwanan mahatha, keppapilaw grama sewa niladhari es.

thagi boga dun bawath ee chara purushayan pawasa sitiya.
owuhu ese kala nam melahakata mema kudu,
me wenathuru me dan kiyapu tika karanna, pahasu kramayak me loke kisima web adawiyaka thibune na..

lasith malinga (nayaka), awishka pa්ranandu, dhanushka gunathilaka, niroshan dikwalla, kusal janith, kusal mendis, bhanuka rajapaksha, ooshadha pa්ranandu, dasun shanaka, shehan jayasuriya, wanindu hasaranga, lakshan sandakan, isuru udana, nuwan pa්radip, kasun rajitha saha lahiru kumara  satahana: bhasura
yannata web adawi . . . .

sadisa namaskaraye ena manawa wigraha kota athi ee upades pamanak ho nisi lesa kriyathmaka karanne nam ada samajaye wadi wadiyen dakinnata labena pawul aarawul samanaya kara ganima apahasu wanne natha.emen ma ihatha sandahan kala lesa wenas athdakim ha sithiwili athi dedenek ekata jiwathwimedi ethek pawathwagena aa hasirim sirith wirith wenas karannata wage ma wenas de anugamanaya karannatath haki manasika shakthiyak godananga gannata da aya wiwahayata pera sita ma adhishtanayak athi kara gatha yuthu ya.‘ya deka noratha rathasamanga ekwimak natha’ rath wu yakadayak ha rath nowu yakadayak kisidu kalekath ekata passiya nohe.

obe uthsahaya ithama agaya karanawa..ee wagema sarthaka wenna kiyalath prarthana karanawa nago...mata kiyanna oba me chithraye thiyena rosa malen mokakda arthawath kale ?

inpasuwa palitha thewarapperuma niyojya amathyawaraya siya madhya kandayamath samanga galewela pradeshiya rohalata gos rohal karya mandalayata bana wadimin mema perahuru kriyawaliya nawatha damana lesa kiya thibe.

pudgalayekuge ipadima, atham pudgalayage dirima, atham pudgalayage ledawima, atham pudgalayekuge maranaya, atham pudgalayeku api්rayayan ha ekwima thawakek pi්rayayangen wenwima, thawa ayekuta kamathi de no labima yana pudgala sankalpaya matha me duka kiyana shirshaya yatathe pahadili kalawita me karuna wiwaranaya kara gannata puluwan.
abiyasa muhuda diswuwak men mahath wu pramodayakin mage das podi wade karaththayak asala nawathini.
ee wagema athithayedi dalada himiyan sangawa thibu kithulpe raja maha wiharaya pihita thibenneda me alla pasukara yaddi hamuwana kithulpe pradeshayeyi.
unwahanse swargaya ha anekuth siyalu wasasthana, yudewwan ha anyachathin da duppathun ha pohosathun da wahalun ha ugathun usulagena yana bawaya.
parewithota ho parethota yanu ingiriya pradeshaye prasiddha sthanayaki.

bhashanaye nidahasa, sanwidhanaya wime nidahasa, thaman darana deshapalana mathawadaya nisa paliganimata lak nowime nidahasa aadi mulika minis ayithiwasikam rakinne yayi kiyana dhanapathi wyawasthawa ma yoda gena dhanapathi panthiye ma thawath kandayamakata sahasika ayuran kada panima kamkaru panthiye deshapalana swadhinathwayata kerena anathuru hangawimaki.

kese namuth 2009 warshaya harennata 2012 ha 2014 warshawala singappuruwa hamuweda, mewara malesiyawa hamuweda parajayawimata siduwiya.kese namuth thawamath mema tharagawali ithihasaye wadima shuratha sankhyawak dinaathi rata shri lankawa wana athara, owun 1989, 1997, 2002 ha 2009 warshawala shuratha jayagena atha.

ee aalepana bhawitha karana rupalawanyagara himiyan pawa athamwita danne na mema aalepanawala adangu drawya pilibandawa.lankawe sitina boho rupalawanyagara pawathwagena yannanta waidya widyawa pilibandawa ho bhauthawedaya pilibandawa danuwath kamak na.ee nisa ee aalepana bhawitha kirimata pera paribhogikayin awabodhayen sitiya yuthuyi.

aththa, adhyapanaya wenuwen rajaya waya karana mudala rajaye wiyadamin prathishathayak lesa wenas wi nathi bawayi.""
